author: Whitney Jefferson
title: Scarlett Johansson Is Single Again
text:
View this image ›
Marvel / Via giphy.com ID: 10399312 2. Scarlett Johansson is single again. View this image ›
Mike Windle / Getty Images ID: 10399143 3. Us Weekly has confirmed that ScarJo and her husband Romain Dauriac have ended their relationship. View this image ›
Afp / AFP / Getty Images ID: 10399272 4. The pair met in 2012 and had a secret wedding in Montana in October of 2014. View this image ›
Mladen Antonov / AFP / Getty Images ID: 10399349 5. They share a daughter, Rose, who is 2. View this image ›
Pascal Le Segretain / Getty Images ID: 10399341 ID: 10399368 If you’re here reading this post and wonder if I’ve written this post before — it turns out, I have! View this image ›
BuzzFeed ID: 10399278 7. But that’s okay! It doesn’t matter at all because lucky is the human being that gets to date ScarJo next. View this image ›
Aldamisa Entertainment / Via giphy.com ID: 10399515
